title: SSSR requests Sahuarita to determine whether Hudbay is in violation of 2013 groundwater pumping agreement
excerpt: SSSR has requested the Sahuarita Town Council to immediately determine whether Hudbay is in violation of the 2013 groundwater pumping agreement.
body: SSSR asked the Town Council to evaluate whether Hudbay is meeting the terms of the 2013 right-of-way agreement for groundwater pumping.
The request cites concerns about the availability of CAP water and the long-term protection of the regional aquifer.
Community members are encouraged to attend council meetings and provide public comment.
